name: part_003
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Noel Shirogane speaks to the audience before starting her song performance.
A transition sequence with atmospheric sound effects and instrumental music leading into the next performance.
Performance of the song 'Nemuru Sakana' by Shirogane Noel.

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグつけてツイートしてくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if you could tweet with the hashtag!

subtitles.original: では、参ります！
subtitles.english: Well then, here we go!

subtitles.original:
眠るサカナ
作詞・作曲：Fullkawa Head.Q.music
subtitles.english:
Nemuru Sakana (Sinking Fish)
Lyrics/Composition: Fullkawa Head.Q.music

subtitles.original: 夜が来た 眠れずに 今日も
subtitles.english: Night has come, unable to sleep, today too

subtitles.original: 雨降り降り、振られて。
subtitles.english: The rain falls and falls, I'm stood up.

subtitles.original: 待ちぼうけ 一人のベッドに
subtitles.english: Waiting in vain, in a bed all alone

subtitles.original: 沈むサカナ
subtitles.english: A sinking fish

subtitles.original: 今夜窓から抜け出したのは
subtitles.english: The one who slipped out the window tonight

subtitles.original: 白い渡り鳥
subtitles.english: Was a white migratory bird

subtitles.original: 夜風に揺れる羽根にくるまって
subtitles.english: Wrapped in feathers swaying in the night breeze

subtitles.original: 目を閉じた
subtitles.english: I closed my eyes

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜はこうやって
subtitles.english: On nights I can't sleep, like this,

subtitles.original: 君を思い出してみる
subtitles.english: I try to remember you

subtitles.original: 会えない日々もそうやって
subtitles.english: Even on days we can't meet, like that,

subtitles.original: 隠してきた
subtitles.english: I've been hiding it

subtitles.original: 傘を開いて窓を叩くよ
subtitles.english: Opening an umbrella, I'll knock on the window

subtitles.original: 裸足のまま連れ出すんだ。
subtitles.english: I'll lead you out while still barefoot.

subtitles.original: 部屋の明かりを消したら
subtitles.english: Once the lights in the room are turned off

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばして、さあ！
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand, come on!

subtitles.original: 踊り出すミュージック！
subtitles.english: The music starts to dance!

subtitles.original: 踊り出すミュージック！
subtitles.english: The music starts to dance!

subtitles.original: 踊り出すミュージック！
subtitles.english: The music starts to dance!

subtitles.original: 踊り出すミュージック！
subtitles.english: The music starts to dance!

subtitles.original: 夜が来た 一人きり 今日も
subtitles.english: Night has come, all alone, today too

subtitles.original: 雨降り濡れたままで
subtitles.english: While still wet from the rain

subtitles.original: 君の手を思い出しながら
subtitles.english: While remembering your hand

subtitles.original: 眠るサカナ
subtitles.english: A sleeping fish

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜はこうやって
subtitles.english: On nights I can't sleep, like this,

subtitles.original: 君を思い浮かべてみる
subtitles.english: I try to imagine you

subtitles.original: 会えない日々はそうやって
subtitles.english: Even on days we can't meet, like that,

subtitles.original: 隠してきた
subtitles.english: I've been hiding it

subtitles.original: 窓を叩く雨にまぎれたら
subtitles.english: If I blend into the rain hitting the window

subtitles.original: 裸足のまま泳いでいくよ
subtitles.english: I'll swim away while still barefoot

subtitles.original: 部屋の明かりを消したら
subtitles.english: Once the lights in the room are turned off

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばして！
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand!

subtitles.english: I try to remember you

subtitles.english: Even on days we can't meet, like that,

subtitles.english: I'll lead you out while still barefoot.

subtitles.english: Reach out your hand, come on!

subtitles.original: 踊り出すミュージック！
subtitles.english: The music starts to dance!
